com.ramineqbal.personbackend.api

Class AddressController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ramineqbal.personbackend.api.AddressController

  • @RequestMapping(value="/api/address")
 @RestController
public class AddressController
extends Object
    AddressController Class is annotated with RestController, thus responsible for mapping API Requests to function calls This API uses the path /api/address

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AddressService database
      The database scheme and operations is implemented by AddressService and is dependency injected with the annotation Autowired

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddressController(AddressService database)
      Constructor for the AddressController.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Address> addAddress(Address Address)
      Defines the Response for POST /api/address/add
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteAddress(Long id)
      Defines the Response for DELETE /api/address/delete/:id; Is used to delete an object, selected by its id
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Address> findAddressById(Long id)
      Defines the Response for GET /api/address/find/:id
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Address>> getAddressList()
      Defines the Response for GET /api/address
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Address> updateAddress(Address Address)
      Defines the Response for PUT /api/address/update

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • database

        @Autowired
private final AddressService database
        The database scheme and operations is implemented by AddressService and is dependency injected with the annotation Autowired

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddressController

        public AddressController(AddressService database)
        Constructor for the AddressController. Will be automatically instantiated by Spring
        Parameters:
        database - This is the dependency injected service that will manage Database Operations

    • Method Detail

      • getAddressList

        @GetMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Address>> getAddressList()
        Defines the Response for GET /api/address
        Returns:
        A HTTP Response containing all Addresses

      • addAddress

        @PostMapping(value="/add")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Address> addAddress(@RequestBody
                                                                                              Address Address)
        Defines the Response for POST /api/address/add
        Parameters:
        Address - The Address object to be added; annotated with RequestBody, thus this method will read the body of the POST request and parse it to an Address Object
        Returns:
        HTTP Response (CREATED) with the added Object being also returned

      • updateAddress

        @PutMapping(value="/update")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Address> updateAddress(@RequestBody
                                                                                                   Address Address)
        Defines the Response for PUT /api/address/update
        Parameters:
        Address - The Address object to be updated; annotated with RequestBody, thus this method will read the body of the PUT request and parse it to an Address Object
        Returns:
        HTTP Response (OK) with the Updated Address Object

      • findAddressById

        @GetMapping(value="/find/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Address> findAddressById(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                        Long id)
        Defines the Response for GET /api/address/find/:id
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the Address Object that this method should return; The value is read from the url within the :id part
        Returns:
        HTTP Response (OK) with the to be selected object

      • deleteAddress

        @DeleteMapping(value="/delete/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteAddress(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                     Long id)
        Defines the Response for DELETE /api/address/delete/:id; Is used to delete an object, selected by its id
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the Address Object that this method should delete; The value is read from the url within the :id part
        Returns:
        HTTP Response (OK) after deletion.
